abstract: With a stock option exchange looming, many Google employees were hoping for a drop in Google shares on Friday.
snippet: With a stock option exchange looming, many Google employees were hoping for a drop in Google shares on Friday.
lead_paragraph: Maybe there weren’t shouts of “down, baby, down.” But on Google campuses across the world on Friday, many employees were no doubt hoping the company’s shares would drop.

headline.main: Googlers Rooting for Google Stock to Drop
